Trade/Device Name(s): BD Phoenix™ Automated Microbiology System Tetracycline 0.5-16 μg/mL
BD Phoenix™M Automated Microbiology System for use with Tetracycline 0.5-16 μg/mL Gram-negative and Gram-positive ID/AST or AST panels
Regulation Name(s): Fully Automated Short-Term Incubation Cycle Antimicrobial Susceptibility Devices
Specimen Type(s): Pure culture isolates of Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacteria
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Phoenix Automated Microbiology System using Tetracycline panels for automated susceptibility testing of Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacterial isolates
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro quantitative determination of antimicrobial susceptibility by minimal inhibitory concentration (MIC) of Gram-negative aerobic and facultative anaerobic bacteria and Gram-positive bacteria isolates from pure culture for identification and/or susceptibility testing
